TLDR: Decade old. Innovative for when it was released. Improved upon in every way in the sequel Left4dead2. Coop shooter. Play the sequel, or maybe Warhammer Vermintide2 instead.
More horror-like and tense than the second one. Worth playing if you appreciate that

This thing always upsets me about the Left 4 Dead titles on Steam. Steam says "Full Controller Support". This is not true... force feedback "Rumble" is not supported. I feel very cheated that this ability is not included in the game when the store page says "Full Controller Support". For this reason I can never write a good review about this title. If "Rumble" is included in the future I will remit my review. Valve has let me down on this one.

Brilliant game and probably one of the best zombie shooters out there. Still holds up even after being made all the way back in 2007. Fast paced gameplay, the characters and replayability make the game all the more enjoyable, however a few bugs and toxic playerbase do put the game down a bit.9/10
This game is so much fun to play on a day when you're bored and you can have tons of fun with your friends too!
